comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: These are a group of Elected Members of the Tanganyika Legislative Council standing on the steps of the Karimjee Hall in Dar es Salaam. On the extreme left is Mr Geoffrey Hucks, OBE,  senior government official responsible for organising the Elections in 1958 and 1959. Behind him is Mr John Baker, member for Western Province. In the front next to Mr Hucks is Mr Rashidi Kawawa,  The woman near the back on the right is Lady Chesham.
